title: Better Buy: Coinbase vs. Ethereum - The Motley Fool
summary:
Investors are debating whether to invest in Ethereum (ETH) or Coinbase (COIN) given the current crypto winter. Ethereum is the leading Layer-1 blockchain services provider, while Coinbase is a popular exchange platform. Both have seen their valuations plummet, but the arguments for investing in Ethereum are:

1. Proven track record: Ethereum has established itself as a leader in blockchain services and has attracted new projects, which could drive demand for its ether token.
2. Lower risk: Coinbase's platform allows users to trade a wide range of cryptocurrencies, but many of these coins may be of low quality and could potentially blow up in scandals.
3. Retention of customers: Coinbase attracted millions of new customers during the crypto frenzy, and it can retain a meaningful portion of those customers even if the industry doesn't rebound.

On the other hand, the arguments for investing in Coinbase are:

1. Upside potential: Coinbase stock is trading at a price-to-sales ratio of

title: Use Multi-Signature And Social Recovery Wallets To Achieve Self-Custody, Ethereum Creator Says - NewsBTC
summary: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin recommends using multi-signature and social recovery wallets for self-custody of crypto assets, amid heightened security concerns following recent wallet attacks. Multi-sig wallets require multiple signatures to authorize transactions, while social recovery wallets allow users to recover stolen funds even if they lose their private key. Buterin suggests using multi-sig wallets for long-term holdings and social recovery wallets for short-term trading activities. He also advises users to choose good guardians to minimize risks of asset loss and to use hardware wallets instead of storing keys in Metamask or Google Drive.

title: Diversified set of guardians required for safe self-custody: Vitalik Buterin - Cointelegraph
summary: Vitalik Buterin emphasizes the importance of having a diversified set of "guardians" to maximize the safety of crypto asset self-custody through multisig and social recovery wallets. He recommends decentralizing wallet guardians to reduce the risk of collusion and concentrate power, and advises on how to choose and test guardians. With the growing number of crypto scams and hacks, self-custody and wallet safety procedures are more critical than ever.

title: ‘Monster’ Ethereum (ETH) Rally Incoming With Additional Altcoin Set To Outperform, Says Top Crypto Analyst - The Daily Hodl
summary: Popular crypto analyst Smart Contracter predicts a massive rally for Ethereum (ETH) after it corrected and reached a key support level. He believes that ETH is ready to surge and has accumulated 3.61 million coins in the past year, worth $6.13 billion. However, whales have unloaded 9.43 million coins during the same timeframe. The analyst also highlights Optimism (OP) as a promising altcoin, as it is at the bottom of a correction and set to move upwards according to the Elliott Wave theory. As of writing, ETH is worth $1,819 and OP is trading at $2.57.

title: Meme Coin Star, Big Eyes Coin, Surpasses Ethereum and Theta Network Presale Records - Analytics Insight
summary:
Sure, here's a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Big Eyes Coin (BIG) has surpassed Ethereum and Theta Network's presale records, generating over $25 million in its presale. BIG is a meme coin that aims to dominate the meme coin sector with its value-packed protocol and features like the Sushi Crew NFT marketplace. Unlike other meme coins, BIG offers users access to DeFi benefits and has a supportive community. Ethereum (ETH) and Theta Network (THETA) have also seen significant success, with Ethereum being the largest NFT trade sector and Theta Network improving video quality for users.

title: Ethereum supply drops by 66,000 ETH in 2023 making it deflationary - Finbold - Finance in Bold
summary: Ethereum supply decreased by 66,000 ETH in 2023 due to the transition to proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus, making it deflationary. This is a result of burning a fraction of transaction fees. The supply of Ethereum will continue to decrease over time, making it attractive to crypto enthusiasts seeking scarce digital assets. Another highly anticipated upgrade, the Shapella upgrade, is scheduled to go live on April 12, introducing validator staking withdrawals to the main network. As of writing, the ETH price is around $1,816.52, with a 26% growth in the last 7 days.

title: Ethereum (ETH) vs Bitcoin (BTC) - Which is the Best Cryptocurrency? - Crypto Economy
summary:
Sure, here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

Ethereum (ETH) and Bitcoin (BTC) are two popular cryptocurrencies with different use cases and features. Ethereum is a decentralized platform for building decentralized applications and smart contracts, while Bitcoin is a store of value and a medium of exchange.

The main differences between the two are:

* Consensus mechanism: Bitcoin uses proof-of-work, while Ethereum uses proof-of-stake.
* Blockchain: Bitcoin uses blockchain for storing transaction data, while Ethereum uses it for executing code.
* Ecosystem: Ethereum has a larger developer community and a more diverse range of use cases, including DeFi, NFTs, and gaming.
* Use cases: Bitcoin is ideal for remittances and privacy-focused transactions, while Ethereum is used for decentralized finance applications and tracking cargo in the shipping industry.
